name: Qarbon Viewlet
summary: Learn about .VIEWLET files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: The ".viewlet" extension actually is used for a folder and not a file. The HTML file within the folder (that references the SWF file) can be opened in any Web browser with the Flash Player plug-in installed.

description: Interactive Flash presentation created by Qarbon presentation software; contains the Flash .SWF file, an .HTML file, and the .QVP source file, which stores images, audio files, and other resources; used for storing project assets together.
